abstract: The Upshot; Microsoft, seeking to fill gap left by absence of federal policy, will require many of its 2,000 contractors and vendors to provide employees who perform Microsoft-related work with 15 paid days off for sick leave and vacation; is among growing number of tech companies advocating better standards for contract employees.
lead_paragraph: The company announced that many of its 2,000 contractors and vendors would have to give employees 15 paid days off for sick leave and vacation time.

headline.main: From Microsoft, a Novel Way to Mandate Sick Leave
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Tells Its Partners to Provide Paid Sick Leave

snippet: The company announced that many of its 2,000 contractors and vendors would have to give employees 15 paid days off for sick leave and vacation time.
